DescriptionData.Title: Mehron Glitter Dust - Dynamite Red (0.25 oz)
DescriptionData.Description:
No face painting design is complete without a little application of glitter and Mehron Glitter Dust is perfect for the final sparkling touch.
Glitter Dust is a polyester based glitter that can be applied with you finger to slightly wet paint or with a dry brush for all over sparkle. It is also made of cosmetic grade materials and is very fine so that the look is not overly chunky or gloppy, but shimmering and glamorous. Your face painted clients will love it.
Mehron Glitter Dust is easy to use as well as it comes in an easy to use shaker top container. 7 grams (0.25 ounces)
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each 0.25 ounces (7 gm) container of Mehron Glitter Dust will give dozens to hundreds of applications
Apply to wet paint with your finger for a glitzy colorful look, or with a dry brush for an all over sparkle
Mehron Glitter is made of cosmetic grade materials
Adds nice highlights to any face painting design
Comes in an easy to use shaker top container
